mailSubject: Updated Checklist for J.P. MORGAN SECURITIES PLC (LEI ID: K6Q0W1PS1L1O4IQL9C32)
mailBody:
Dear Surbhi,

I hope this message finds you well.

Thank you for your previous email regarding the updated checklist for J.P. MORGAN SECURITIES PLC. I have reviewed the attachment and updated the checklist accordingly, incorporating the latest PEP screening data and addressing the outstanding items. Below is the updated checklist for your reference:

### Updated Checklist for J.P. MORGAN SECURITIES PLC (LEI ID: K6Q0W1PS1L1O4IQL9C32)

| Checklist Item                        | Status     | Comment                                                                                      | Source                          |
|---------------------------------------|------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|---------------------------------|
| Company Address Proof                 | Validated  | Address proof is available with utility bill issued by London City Utilities.               | DIM_CompanyAddressProof         |
| Company Annual Account and Ellipro Survey | Validated  | Annual accounts and Ellipro scores for 2020–2022 are available.                              | DIM_CompanyAnnualAccountsAndElliproSurvey |
| Company Bank and Postal Details       | Validated  | Bank and postal details are verified with available bank account and SWIFT code.            | DIM_CompanyBankAndPostalDetails |
| Company Directorship                  | Pending    | Directorship data available but verification is still under review.                         | DIM_CompanyDirectorship         |
| Company Tax Documentation             | Pending    | Multiple tax documents found, but some are still under review or require additional info.   | DIM_CompanyTaxDocuments         |
| Company Regulatory Compliance         | Pending    | Some compliance status is under review; not all documentation is verified yet.              | DIM_CompanyRegulatory           |
| Company Business Scope                | Pending    | Business scope details are available, but verification is pending.                          | DIM_CompanyBusinessScope        |
| Company PEP Screening                 | Validated  | PEP screening data is available and verified from the attachment.                           | Agent Data                      |
| Company Revenue Details               | Validated  | Total net revenue of 158.1 billion dollars for the year ended December 31, 2023 is reported.| Annual Report                  |
| Company Market Capitalization Details | Validated  | Market capitalization as of December 31, 2023 is reported as 489,320 million dollars.       | Annual Report                  | 

If you have any further questions or require additional information, please do not hesitate to reach out.

Best regards,
